code: const VALID_ROLES=new Set(["citizen","registrar","bank"]);export function getStoredRole(){const role=localStorage.getItem("role");return VALID_ROLES.has(role)?role:null;}export function getHomePathForRole(role){if(role==="citizen")return"/citizen";if(role==="registrar")return"/registrar";if(role==="bank")return"/bank";return"/login";}
